ComicInfo.Title: Brush Up Your Beethoven; Number Crunch; Tuxedo Junction; From the Drawing Board; Classic Peanuts Strips
ComicInfo.Summary: Appealing to old fans and new alike, this ongoing series features classic Schulz original Sunday Strips and a whole series of new Peanuts stories, including the return of the infamous Snoopy persona, Joe CARDSHARK?!? This is a comic you won't want to miss!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:43:18. [CVDB423727]
ComicInfo.Writer: Art Roche, Charles M. Schulz, Paige Braddock, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Penciller: Andy Hirsch, Charles M. Schulz, Paige Braddock, Scott Jeralds
ComicInfo.Inker: Andy Hirsch, Charles M. Schulz, Justin Thompson, Paige Braddock
ComicInfo.Colorist: Art Roche, Donna Almendrala, Justin Thompson, Lisa Moore
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Charles M. Schulz, Iain R. Morris
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Alexis E. Fajardo, Matt Gagnon, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Snoopy
